body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarShip Co. My name is Donald Evans. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Victoria Hayes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Victoria. Can you provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five two three four one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Victoria. Is there anything else you'd like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling rather upset about the shipping delays.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Victoria. We will do our best to resolve this issue promptly. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Have a great day, Victoria. Goodbye.
